attributes.action: The British taxpayer should not have to pay for John Bercow's (Commons Speaker) suits, business class flights and travel for his wife.
attributes.additional_details: The British Taxpayer should not have to pay for John Bercow's (Commons Speaker) suits, business class travel or travel for his wife. He should buy his own work clothes, like the rest of us. And if he wants to fly business class then he should pay the difference out of his own pocket.
